程序包 game.actions

  • 类概要
    类 说明
    ActivateBonfireAction
    Activate bonfire action
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    HealAction
    The class is for requirement1 - The player drinks Estus to heal himself
    KillSelfAction
    Undead will Kill itself when it invokes the action
    OpenChestAction
    action - to open Chest two cases here
    PickUpTokenAction
    an action that will be used when the player picks up a souls of Token override PickUpItemAction
    RestAction
    RestAction - player take the action to reset health/hit points and refill Estus Flask to maximum charges
    ResurgenceAction
    When the Skeleton is going to die (i.e. hitPoint = 0), it can use its skill, the Action will be invoked on his turn.
    SoftResetAction
    Soft reset action, it will make use of resetManager to run soft-reset to make sure including all instances that need to be reset.
    SwapWeaponAction
    An action to swap weapon (new weapon replaces old weapon).
    TeleportAction
    Teleport Action Player will call the action when the player besides on a bonfire
    TradeCinderAction
    Trade action - trade weapons with Vendor using cindersOfLord
    TradeWeaponAction
    The player trades with the Vendor by executed this class.
